issues.title: Immigration Control
issues.description: Strong supporter of border security, advocates for stricter immigration enforcement and completing border wall construction
issues.source: Campaign website and congressional voting record

issues.title: Pro-Life Stance
issues.description: Opposes abortion, supports comprehensive restrictions on reproductive healthcare

issues.title: Second Amendment Rights
issues.description: Staunch defender of gun ownership, opposes gun control legislation

issues.title: Tax Reduction
issues.description: Supports lower corporate and individual tax rates, advocates for simplified tax code

issues.title: Healthcare Deregulation
issues.description: Opposes Affordable Care Act, supports market-based healthcare solutions

issues.title: Education School Choice
issues.description: Supports charter schools and school voucher programs, advocates for reducing federal education bureaucracy

issues.title: Climate Change Skepticism
issues.description: Opposes major climate regulation, supports fossil fuel industry

issues.title: Foreign Policy Hawkishness
issues.description: Supports strong military funding, critical of diplomatic engagement with adversarial nations
